content: As part of the recent HL7 ballot, we balloted the CDS Hooks patient-view hook. This is exciting because, up till now, all of our hooks have only existed in community release of CDS Hooks and we're about to have a ANSI-track hook!

From this ballot, we got 22 distinct comments. Of these, I'm putting the following 9 comments into a block vote (also below). If you feel that your comment should be discussed individually or are otherwise dissatisfied with the proposed resolution, please reply by March 18th and I'll remove it from the block vote. @Bas van den Heuvel , @Chris Melo , @Paul Knapp , @Rick Geimer , Celine Lefebvre, Victor Lin, @Nick Radov

In jira.hl7.org, this incantation will give you the below list: Grouping = Block-Vote-1 AND project = FHIR AND Specification = "CDS Hooks patient-view (FHIR) [FHIR-cds-hooks-patient-view]" order by issuekey

- FHIR-25750 - bas - Persuasive with Mod
- FHIR-25758 - Bas - Persuasive with Mod
- FHIR-25751 - Chris Melo - Persuasive
- FHIR-25765 - Paul Knapp - Persuasive
- FHIR-25770 - Rick Geimer - Persuasive with Mod
- FHIR-25755 - Bas - Considered (Question Answered)
- FHIR-25759 - Celine Lefebvre - Not Persuasive
- FHIR-25768 - Victor Lin - Persuasive with Mod
- FHIR-25769 - Nick Radov - Considered - Question Answered
Cross-posting on HL7 CDS wg email list.

Hi everyone, and especially: Behnaz Minaei, @Paul Knapp , @Dennis Patterson , @Isaac Vetter , @Celine A Lefebvre and @Bas van den Heuvel.

The following issues are in the CDS Hooks patient-view hook definition ballot's Block-Vote-2. This block vote will be discussed during the CDS wg call on April 29 and voted on during the CDS wg call on May 6th. If you disagree with the proposed resolution or even if an issue would benefit from additional discussion, please update your jira comment and let me know to withdraw that issue from the block vote.

Thank you!

• FHIR-25767 - Behnaz Minaei - Persuasive
  • FHIR-25764 - Paul Knapp - Persuasive with Mod
  • FHIR-25762 - Dennis Patterson - Retracted
  • FHIR-25761 - Isaac Vetter - Persuasive with Mod
  • FHIR-25760 - Celine Lefebvre - Not Persuasive
  • FHIR-25757 - Bas - Persuasive with Mod
  • FHIR-25756 - Bas - Not Persuasive
  • FHIR-25754 - Bas - Persuasive with Mod
  • FHIR-25753 - Bas - Persuasive with Mod
  • FHIR-25752 - Bas - Persuasive with Mod
I don't think you need to vote on retracted items :)
